body.value:
We'll paint one happy little tree right here. Even trees need a friend. We all need friends. Everyone wants to enjoy the good parts - but you have to build the framework first.

Let's get wild today. That easy. I thought today we would do a happy little picture. If we're gonna walk though the woods, we need a little path. You have to allow the paint to break to make it beautiful. These little son of a guns hide in your brush and you just have to push them out.

Now let's put some happy little clouds in here. This is truly an almighty mountain. Look around, look at what we have. Beauty is everywhere, you only have to look to see it. You got your heavy coat out yet? It's getting colder. There is no right or wrong - as long as it makes you happy and doesn't hurt anyone.

We'll paint one happy little tree right here. Even trees need a friend. We all need friends. Everyone wants to enjoy the good parts - but you have to build the framework first.

Let's get wild today. That easy. I thought today we would do a happy little picture. If we're gonna walk though the woods, we need a little path. You have to allow the paint to break to make it beautiful. These little son of a guns hide in your brush and you just have to push them out.

Now let's put some happy little clouds in here. This is truly an almighty mountain. Look around, look at what we have. Beauty is everywhere, you only have to look to see it. You got your heavy coat out yet? It's getting colder. There is no right or wrong - as long as it makes you happy and doesn't hurt anyone.
